item.title: Why We Can Trust God When Tragedy Strikes, Whether He ‘Allows’ It Or Not
item.description: To give a Christian response to the problem of evil means it is possible that God permits evil and suffering because He can bring about a greater good...

item.title: Emil Bove Will Be An Effective, Pro-Liberty Judge, And That Makes Democrats Angry
item.description: 'It’s become routine this Congress, but it’s not new. We all remember what Democrats did to Justice Kavanaugh,' Sen. Chuck Grassley said.

item.title: Axios Says ‘No One Knows’ Why Illegal Immigrant Traffic Is Down
item.description: Everyone with a brain knows why illegal immigration along the U.S. Mexico border has fallen so much. So does Axios, really. Spoiler Alert: It's Donald...

item.title: In A World Of Chip And Joanna Gaineses, Be A John MacArthur
item.description: The church needs far fewer celebrity Christians like Chip Gaines and a lot more willing, third-level galley slaves like John MacArthur.

item.title: Federal Workers Are Being Held Accountable For The First Time, And They’re Not Handling It Well
item.description: Obnoxious and entitled federal bureaucrats' attempts to resist reform are making it hard to say good things about public service.
